name: Super Luigi RPG: Star Powered
overview: Star Powered is a mod that adds: LUIGI and DAISY over MARIO and PEACH New music made by CousinCatnip and DarkKefka!! Various Items and Equipment New Armor and Accessories for Bowser, Luigi, Mallow, Daisy and Geno. More Spells for Luigi, Bowser, Mallow and Geno! New boss fights in areas that could have benefitted from one. NO MORE UNUSED ENEMIES New enemies too! One late game area is now entirely different! MASSIVE stat boosts once you hit level 27-30 (Albeit not as massive as of 2.5)
